alioth.changelog:

- Switch NXP NFC HAL (Now should read mifare card and another tag)
- Reserved vendor partition size

Kernel:

cas.changelog:
Hi, ArrowOS 12.0
Firmware: V12.5.6
Date: 2021-11-11
Changelog: 
1. Sync with the latest source

2021-11-2
1. Sync with the latest source
2. Fix brightness level mapping
3. Handle more scenarios when getting fod dim alpha
4. Update brightness and vibrator configs

2021-11-1
1. Sync with the latest source

2021-10-30
1. Sync with the latest source
2. Ship GCamGOPrebuilt instead of Camera2/Snap
3. Bring back IFAAManager
4. Move to AOSP WFD

2021-10-27
1. Sync with the latest source

2021-10-26
1. Disable FBE(Maybe you should clean flash to make twrp decrypt data)
2. Limit charging current to 6A (Fix overheating when charging)
3. Fix multiple SIM cards display
4. ...

2021-10-17:
1. Initial releases
2. SeLinux permissive
3. Test version

cepheus.changelog:
Kernel changes:
• Upstreamed to .232
• Merge latest CAF tag LA.UM.9.1.r1-10200-SMxxx0.0
• Merge WireGuard v1.0.20210424
• Improve low memory killer
• Mirco-optimize scheduler
• Drop unused NUMA feature(Non-Uniform Memory Access)
• Bring back userspace boost method
• Add some thermal zones for mi_thermald
• Enable Ftrace for iorap perfetto

Device specific changes:
• Update prebuilt firmware and blobs from cepheus-user 11 RKQ1.200826.002 21.4.7 release-keys
• Switch to POCO X3 Pro Global Listen stack and hotwordenrollment blobs (fixes screen off Google hotword detection and low mic volume when enabled OK Google)
• Add proper configs for burn-in protection
• Drop non-functional power off alarm blobs
• Reset to miui stock audio configs
• Cleanup SEPolicy rules also resolve all neverallow rues
• Disable GPU Boost during interaction powerhint
• Fix camera stutter in some apps
• Enable iorap readahead (Improve app startup time)
• Enable unspecialized app process pool
• Use Gcam Go only with gapped releases (use snap with vanila releases)
• Update to June redfin fingerprint 
• Flatten APEXs for performance
• Make the UI smoother
• Use "Xiaomi Mi 9" for default ssid name 
• Some stuff else, go read commit list on Github.

davinci.changelog:
10/07/2021
- Fixed the fingerprint dialog
- Disabled the SIM is HD capable notification
- Enabled ambient display settings

20/06/2021
- Rebased the device sources
- Switched to the Qualcomm Power HAL
- Switched to a different screen off fod implementation

22/05/2021
- Improved power consumption
- Switched to VantomKernel

11/05/2021
- Updated blobs from MIUI 21.4.28

Notes:
- Recommended firmware is MIUI 20.10.20 or higher (China Beta)
- Minimum firmware is MIUI V12.0.5.0
- Recommended recovery is the OFFICIAL TWRP

miatoll.changelog:

• Upstreamed kernel to 4.14.246

phoenix.changelog:
• Remove dsp. prefix from audio and video power profiles
• Set frame rate multiple thresholds to 120
• Get rid of VLA usage
• Select ARCH_HAS_FAST_MULTIPLIER
• Reserve caches for small, high-frequency memory allocations in binder
• Enable exFAT FS 
• Implement rapid GC f2fs
• Some ufs optimizations
• Force applications to use TCP_NODELAY to improve network latency
• Take lesser time to enter sleep
• Reduce TCP performance spikes
• aac: Hardcode max_bitrate to 384k
• Merge Linux version 4.14.255 into the kernel 
• Many more misc changes from StormBreaker-X5

- Added Dev frequency boost
